childMarkdownRemark.html:
Monthly Ration for Daily Wage Earner Impacted by COVID-19 Job Loss

What:

Help families that are effected by the COVID-19 situation where the bread earners have lost their job

How:

Partner with trusted sources to buy ration at affordable rates, and filter the candidates to identify deserving families, and deliver the ration to their doorstep (if possible)
Distribution of ration for families in Karachi, Pakistan that need assistance.

2020 Ramadhan ration distribution for families in Badin, Sindh, Pakistan

We have an opportunity to distribute ration to a number of families in Interior Sindh areas of Gharo/Sakro/Badin.

Upto 500 underpriviledged families to benefit from this drive, where ration will be served to children that come to masjid for learning Qurâ€™an.

Value : encouragement to parents & children to continue to be connected to masaajid

internal.content:
# 2020 Ramadhan ration distribution for families in Badin, Sindh, Pakistan

We have an opportunity to distribute ration to a number of families in Interior Sindh areas of Gharo/Sakro/Badin.

Upto 500 underpriviledged families to benefit from this drive, where ration will be served to children that come to masjid for learning Qur'an. 

__Value__ : encouragement to parents & children to continue to be connected to masaajid
